messages.content: What does the Text Switch 2 Way node do in ComfyUI?
The Text Switch 2 Way node is a switch that selects the first non-empty string input.
What is the purpose of the Prompt Tidy node in ComfyUI?
The Prompt Tidy node is used to remove redundant spaces and duplicate comma's from the input.
What kind of input does the Text Switch 2 Way node expect?
The Text Switch 2 Way node expects two strings as input, and it will select the first non-empty string.
How does the Prompt Tidy node improve the input?
The Prompt Tidy node removes redundant spaces and duplicate comma's from the input.
What happens when both inputs to the Text Switch 2 Way node are empty?
If both inputs to the Text Switch 2 Way node are empty, it will not select any string and the output will be empty.
What is the result of the Prompt Tidy node if the input contains a string with multiple consecutive comma's?
The Prompt Tidy node will remove all duplicate comma's from the input string.
What is the main goal of using ComfyUI Custom Nodes?
The main goal of using ComfyUI Custom Nodes is to extend the functionality of ComfyUI by adding additional nodes or modifying existing ones to meet specific needs.
